text: (musalamaanon) tum par jihaad pharj qiya gaya agarache tum par shaaq zarur hai aur ajab nahin ki tum kisee cheez (jihaad) ko naapasand karo haaloki vah tumhaare haq mein behatar ho aur ajab nahin ki tum kisee cheez ko pasand karo haaloki vah tumhaare haq mein buree ho aur khuda (to) jaanata hee hai magar tum nahee jaanate ho
